name: uieRuler

description.text: Append Photoshop-like rulers to the page and let the user to use guidelines draggable from both rulers and adjustable via keypress events (arrows, shift+arrows, alt+arrows).

id: The ID attribute for the component container.
options: A collection of properties for customize the component's layout and behavior.

properties.text: You can pass some (or all) of these properties within an object inside constructor.

extension: Css extension object for customizable element.
reference: The HTML element for every positioning reference.
guidelinesContainer: Where guidelines will be appended to.
rulerStepMin: Number of minimum units before medium tick.
rulerStepMed: Number of medium tick before max tick.

appendEvent():
This method should be called as soon as uieRuler becames part of HTML structure.
It returns the component itself.
